column4: i have an ubuntu server that has two ethernet cards. One for internet coming in, and one for a local network. The local network seems down (no ping replies) altough the interface is up (/var/log/messages and syslog). How can i find out if the second card (eth2) is broken or something like that ? How can i find out WHAT's wrong ? Thanks :)
try ifconfig, msg me the output.
as in the terminal, type ifconfig
eth2 looks fine to me. reset the modem
